Row.Text: [COLOR_MAGENTA]Commoners[ENDCOLOR] support your rural interests.[NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Beginning[ENDCOLOR] this tree grants +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture on Granaries and Watermills, and increases the construction of these Buildings by 20%.[NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Finishing[ENDCOLOR] this tree grants +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness and +1 [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] 'WLTKD' Sentiment on Granaries and Watermills.

[COLOR_MAGENTA]Assemblies[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness for each City you own [ICON_CONNECTED] connected to the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital and -20% [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness from number of Cities.

[COLOR_MAGENTA]Citizenship[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE]Speeds the training of Civilian Units in all cities by 20% and cities you found will increase the [ICON_CULTURE] Culture cost of policies by 33% less than normal.
[COLOR_MAGENTA]Communalism[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE]Towns and Villages upgrade 20% faster and yield +1 [ICON_JFD_DEVELOPMENT] Development.

[COLOR_MAGENTA]Nobility[ENDCOLOR] support your interests.[NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Beginning[ENDCOLOR] this tree grants +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture on Walls and Castles, and increases the construction of these Buildings by 20%.[NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Finishing[ENDCOLOR] this tree grants +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness and +1 [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] 'WLTKD' Sentiment on Walls and Castles.

[COLOR_MAGENTA]Soldiers[ENDCOLOR] support your military interests.[NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Beginning[ENDCOLOR] this tree grants +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture on Barracks and Armories, and increases the construction of these Buildings by 20%.[NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Finishing[ENDCOLOR] this tree grants +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness and +1 [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] 'WLTKD' Sentiment on Barracks and Armories.

[COLOR_MAGENTA]Priesthood[ENDCOLOR] supports your religious interests.[NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Beginning[ENDCOLOR] this tree grants +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture on Temples and Monasteries, and increases the construction of these Buildings by 20%.[NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Finishing[ENDCOLOR] this tree grants +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness and +1 [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] 'WLTKD' Sentiment on Temples and Monasteries.

[COLOR_MAGENTA]Merchants[ENDCOLOR] support your commercial interests.[NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Beginning[ENDCOLOR] this tree grants +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture on Markets and Banks, and increases the construction of these Buildings by 20%.[NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Finishing[ENDCOLOR] this tree grants +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness and +1 [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] 'WLTKD' Sentiment on Markets and Banks.

[COLOR_MAGENTA]Artists[ENDCOLOR] support your industrial interests.[NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Beginning[ENDCOLOR] this tree grants +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture on Granaries and Watermills, and increases the construction of these Buildings by 20%.[NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Finishing[ENDCOLOR] this tree grants +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness and +1 [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] 'WLTKD' Sentiment on Granaries and Watermills.

[COLOR_MAGENTA]Bureaucrats[ENDCOLOR] support your foreign interests.[NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Beginning[ENDCOLOR] this tree grants +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture on Courthouses and Constabularies, and increases the construction of these Buildings by 20%.[NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Finishing[ENDCOLOR] this tree grants +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness and +1 [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] 'WLTKD' Sentiment on Courthouses and Constabularies.

[COLOR_MAGENTA]Bureaucrats[ENDCOLOR] support your foreign interests.[NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Beginning[ENDCOLOR] this tree grants +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture on Chanceries and High Courts, and increases the construction of these Buildings by 20%.[NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Finishing[ENDCOLOR] this tree grants +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness and +1 [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] 'WLTKD' Sentiment on Chanceries and High Courts.

[COLOR_MAGENTA]Admiralty[ENDCOLOR] support your maritime interests.[NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Beginning[ENDCOLOR] this tree grants +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture on Harbours and Seaports, and increases the construction of these Buildings by 20%.[NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Finishing[ENDCOLOR] this tree grants +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness and +1 [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] 'WLTKD' Sentiment on Harbours and Seaports.

[COLOR_MAGENTA]Scholars[ENDCOLOR] support your academic interests.[NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Beginning[ENDCOLOR] this tree grants +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture on Universities and Public Schools, and increases the construction of these Buildings by 20%.[NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Finishing[ENDCOLOR] this tree grants +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness and +1 [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] 'WLTKD' Sentiment on Universities and Public Schools.

[COLOR_MAGENTA]Scholars[ENDCOLOR] support your academic interests.[NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Beginning[ENDCOLOR] this tree grants +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture on Universities and Research Institutes, and increases the construction of these Buildings by 20%.[NEWLINE]------------------[NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Finishing[ENDCOLOR] this tree grants +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness and +1 [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] 'WLTKD' Sentiment on Universities and Research Institutes.
